page.title: 17CLUBS IN HERNE BAY
page.content: This Block contains the bases for several of Herne Bay's sporting clubs. The Town has long had a reputation for roller skating and although the old pier pavilion has gone the sport continues. Roller hockey is played in the new pier pavilion and in recent years the speedskaters of Herne Bay Flyers Club can be seen most evenings practising in the William Street car park. The Club has several international skaters and it stages an annual international tournament in Herne Bay. In recent years Herne Bay Tennis and Hockey Clubs have combined to build a fine club house in Beacon Road, though most hockey matches are still played in the Park. A rather older clubhouse is that of the Herne Bay Sailing Club at the eastern end of the town. In Winter this area is rather bleak but in Summer Club v.busy
